title: Enchanting Floral Zircon Haaram with Pink Sapphires and Pearls
materials: Base metal coated with Gold finish. Embellished with high-quality Zircon stones
Pink Sapphire stones and South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced shine and durability.
features: Intricate floral design with layered petals encrusted with sparkling Zircons. Delicate Pink Sapphire accents add a touch of romantic color. Lustrous South Sea Pearls are strategically placed to enhance the necklace's elegance and movement. Features a central floral pendant with a suspended pearl. Modern design inspired by traditional floral motifs.
colors: with soft Pink accents from the Sapphires and creamy white Pearls. The interplay of colors creates a visually stunning effect.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. A sophisticated choice for women who appreciate contemporary jewelry with a hint of tradition. Can also be worn as bridal jewelry for a modern bride.
description: Combines the timeless beauty of floral design with the brilliance of high-quality Zircons and the elegance of South Sea Pearls. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures lasting shine and durability. Its contemporary design makes it a versatile piece that can be paired with both traditional and modern attire. A true statement piece that will elevate any outfit.
